00067     class Exception : public std::exception
00068     {
00069     public:
00073         Exception( const std::string& details );
00074         ~Exception() throw();
00075 
00077         const char* what() const throw();
00078 
00079         std::string m_details; 
00080     };
00081 
00086     #define TICPPTHROW( message )                                           \
00087     {                                                                       \
00088         std::ostringstream full_message;                                    \
00089         std::string file( __FILE__ );                                       \
00090         file = file.substr( file.find_last_of( "\\/" ) + 1 );               \
00091         full_message << message << " <" << file << "@" << __LINE__ << ">";  \
00092         throw Exception( full_message.str() );                              \
00093     }

00105     class Visitor : public TiXmlVisitor
00106     {
00107     public:
00108         // Overload the TiXmlVisitor functions, wrap objects, call ticpp::Visitor functions
00110         virtual bool VisitEnter( const TiXmlDocument& doc );
00112         virtual bool VisitExit( const TiXmlDocument& doc );
00114         virtual bool VisitEnter( const TiXmlElement& element, const TiXmlAttribute* firstAttribute );
00116         virtual bool VisitExit( const TiXmlElement& element );
00118         virtual bool Visit( const TiXmlDeclaration& declaration );
00120         virtual bool Visit( const TiXmlStylesheetReference& stylesheet );
00122         virtual bool Visit( const TiXmlText& text );
00124         virtual bool Visit( const TiXmlComment& comment );
00125 
00126     public:
00128         virtual bool VisitEnter( const Document& /*doc*/ )          { return true; }
00130         virtual bool VisitExit( const Document& /*doc*/ )           { return true; }
00131 
00133         virtual bool VisitEnter( const Element& /*element*/, const Attribute* /*firstAttribute*/ )  { return true; }
00135         virtual bool VisitExit( const Element& /*element*/ )        { return true; }
00136 
00138         virtual bool Visit( const Declaration& /*declaration*/ )    { return true; }
00140         virtual bool Visit( const StylesheetReference& /*stylesheet*/ ) { return true; }
00142         virtual bool Visit( const Text& /*text*/ )                  { return true; }
00144         virtual bool Visit( const Comment& /*comment*/ )            { return true; }
00145     };

00148     class Base
00149     {
00150     public:
00151 
00157         template < class T >
00158             std::string ToString( const T& value ) const
00159         {
00160             std::stringstream convert;
00161             convert << value;
00162             if ( convert.fail() )
00163             {
00164                 TICPPTHROW( "Could not convert value to text" );
00165             }
00166             return convert.str();
00167         }
00168 
00169         std::string ToString( const std::string& value ) const
00170         {
00171             return value;
00172         }
00173 
00180         template < class T >
00181             void FromString( const std::string& temp, T* out ) const
00182         {
00183             std::istringstream val( temp );
00184             val >> *out;
00185 
00186             if ( val.fail() )
00187             {
00188                 TICPPTHROW( "Could not convert \"" << temp << "\" to target type" );
00189             }
00190         }
00191 
00195         void FromString( const std::string& temp, std::string* out ) const
00196         {
00197             *out = temp;
00198         }
00199 
00204         int Row() const
00205         {
00206             return GetBasePointer()->Row();
00207         }
00208 
00213         int Column() const
00214         {
00215             return GetBasePointer()->Column();
00216         }
00217 
00221         virtual ~Base()
00222         {
00223             DeleteSpawnedWrappers();
00224         }
00225 
00226     protected:
00227         mutable TiCppRCImp* m_impRC;    
00229         mutable std::vector< Base* > m_spawnedWrappers; 
00237         void SetImpRC( TiXmlBase* node )
00238         {
00239             m_impRC = node->m_tiRC;
00240         }
00241 
00242         void ValidatePointer() const
00243         {
00244             if ( m_impRC->IsNull() )
00245             {
00246                 TICPPTHROW( "Internal TiXml Pointer is NULL" );
00247             }
00248         }
00249 
00254         void DeleteSpawnedWrappers()
00255         {
00256             std::vector< Base* >::reverse_iterator wrapper;
00257             for ( wrapper = m_spawnedWrappers.rbegin(); wrapper != m_spawnedWrappers.rend(); ++wrapper )
00258             {
00259                 delete *wrapper;
00260             }
00261             m_spawnedWrappers.clear();
00262         }
00263 
00268         virtual TiXmlBase* GetBasePointer() const = 0;
00269     };

00718         Node* NextSibling( const char* value, bool throwIfNoSiblings = true ) const;
00719 
00727         template < class T >
00728             void IterateFirst( const std::string& value, T** first ) const
00729         {
00730             *first = 0;
00731             for( Node* child = FirstChild( value, false ); child; child = child->NextSibling( value, false ) )
00732             {
00733                 *first = dynamic_cast< T* >( child );
00734                 if ( 0 != *first )
00735                 {
00736                     return;
00737                 }
00738             }
00739         }
00740 
00741         virtual void IterateFirst( const std::string&, Attribute** ) const
00742         {
00743             TICPPTHROW( "Attributes can only be iterated with Elements." )
00744         }
00745 
00753         template < class T >
00754             void IterateNext( const std::string& value, T** next ) const
00755         {
00756             Node* sibling = NextSibling( value, false );
00757             *next = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00758 
00759             while ( ( 0 != sibling ) && ( 0 == *next ) )
00760             {
00761                 sibling = sibling->NextSibling( value, false );
00762                 *next = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00763             }
00764         }
00765 
00773         template < class T >
00774             void IteratePrevious( const std::string& value, T** previous  ) const
00775         {
00776             Node* sibling = PreviousSibling( value, false );
00777             *previous = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00778 
00779             while ( ( 0 != sibling ) && ( 0 == *previous ) )
00780             {
00781                 sibling = sibling->PreviousSibling( value, false );
00782                 *previous = dynamic_cast< T* >( sibling );
00783             }
00784         }
00785 
00794         Element* NextSiblingElement( bool throwIfNoSiblings = true ) const;
00795 
00804         Element* NextSiblingElement( const std::string& value, bool throwIfNoSiblings = true ) const;

00864         Document* GetDocument( bool throwIfNoDocument = true ) const;

00872 
00879         template < class T >
00880             T* To() const
00881         {
00882             T* pointer = dynamic_cast< T* >( this );
00883             if ( 0 == pointer )
00884             {
00885                 std::string thisType = typeid( this ).name();
00886                 std::string targetType = typeid( T ).name();
00887                 std::string thatType = typeid( *this ).name();
00888                 TICPPTHROW( "The " << thisType.substr( 6 ) << " could not be casted to a " << targetType.substr( 6 )
00889                     << " *, because the target object is not a " << targetType.substr( 6 ) << ". (It is a " << thatType.substr( 6 ) << ")" );
00890             }
00891             return pointer;
00892         }
00893 
00899         Document* ToDocument() const;
00900

00964         friend std::istream& operator >>( std::istream& in, Node& base )
00965         {
00966             in >> *base.GetTiXmlPointer();
00967             return in;
00968         }
00969 
00973         friend std::ostream& operator <<( std::ostream& out, Node& base )

00976             return out;
00977         }

01025     template < class T = Node >
01026         class Iterator
01027     {
01028     private:
01029         T* m_p;                 
01030         std::string m_value;    
01032     public:
01033 
01043         T* begin( const Node* parent ) const
01044         {
01045             T* pointer;
01046             parent->IterateFirst( m_value, &pointer );
01047             return pointer;
01048         }
01049 
01058         T* end() const
01059         {
01060             return 0;
01061         }
01062 
01071         Iterator( const std::string& value = "" )
01072             : m_p( 0 ), m_value( value )
01073         {
01074         }
01075 
01077         Iterator( T* node, const std::string& value = "" )
01078             : m_p( node ), m_value( value )
01079         {
01080         }
01081 
01083         Iterator( const Iterator& it, const std::string& value  = "" )
01084             : m_p( it.m_p ), m_value( value )
01085         {
01086         }
01087 
01092         T* Get() const
01093         {
01094             return m_p;
01095         }
01096 
01098         Iterator& operator=( const Iterator& it )
01099         {
01100             m_p = it.m_p;
01101             return *this;
01102         }
01103 
01105         Iterator& operator=( T* p )
01106         {
01107             m_p = p;
01108             return *this;
01109         }
01110 
01112         Iterator& operator++()
01113         {
01114             m_p->IterateNext( m_value, &m_p );
01115             return *this;
01116         }
01117 
01119         Iterator& operator++(int)
01120         {
01121             return this->operator ++();
01122         }
01123 
01125         Iterator& operator--()
01126         {
01127             m_p->IteratePrevious( m_value, &m_p );
01128             return *this;
01129         }
01130 
01132         Iterator& operator--(int)
01133         {
01134             return this->operator --();
01135         }
01136 
01138         bool operator!=( T* p ) const
01139         {
01140             return m_p != p;
01141         }
01142 
01144         bool operator!=( const Iterator& it ) const
01145         {
01146             return m_p != it.m_p;
01147         }
01148 
01150         bool operator==( T* p ) const
01151         {
01152             return m_p == p;
01153         }
01154 
01156         bool operator==( const Iterator& it ) const
01157         {
01158             return m_p == it.m_p;
01159         }
01160 
01162         T* operator->() const
01163         {
01164             return m_p;
01165         }
01166 
01168         T& operator*() const
01169         {
01170             return *m_p;
01171         }
01172     };
01173 
01175     template < class T >
01176         class NodeImp : public Node
01177     {
01178     protected:
01179 
01180         T* m_tiXmlPointer;      
01188         TiXmlNode* GetTiXmlPointer() const
01189         {
01190             ValidatePointer();
01191             return m_tiXmlPointer;
01192         }
01193 
01201         void SetTiXmlPointer( T* newPointer )
01202         {
01203             m_tiXmlPointer = newPointer;
01204             SetImpRC( newPointer );
01205         }
01206 
01211         NodeImp( T* tiXmlPointer )
01212         {
01213             // Check for NULL pointers
01214             if ( 0 == tiXmlPointer )
01215             {
01216                 TICPPTHROW( "Can not create a " << typeid( T ).name() );
01217             }
01218             SetTiXmlPointer( tiXmlPointer );
01219             m_impRC->IncRef();
01220         }
01221 
01227         virtual void operator=( const NodeImp<T>& copy )
01228         {
01229             DeleteSpawnedWrappers();
01230 
01231             // Dropping the reference to the old object
01232             this->m_impRC->DecRef();
01233 
01234             // Pointing to the new Object
01235             SetTiXmlPointer( copy.m_tiXmlPointer );
01236 
01237             // The internal tixml pointer changed in the above line
01238             this->m_impRC->IncRef();
01239         }
01240 
01246         NodeImp( const NodeImp<T>& copy ) : Node( copy )
01247         {
01248             // Pointing to the new Object
01249             SetTiXmlPointer( copy.m_tiXmlPointer );
01250 
01251             // The internal tixml pointer changed in the above line
01252             this->m_impRC->IncRef();
01253         }
01254 
01255     public:
01256 
01257         /*
01258         Deletes the spawned wrapper objects.
01259         Decrements reference count.
01260         */
01261         virtual ~NodeImp()
01262         {
01263             // The spawnedWrappers need to be deleted before m_tiXmlPointer
01264             DeleteSpawnedWrappers();
01265             m_impRC->DecRef();
01266         }
01267     };

01439             Element( const std::string& value, const T& text )

01443             SetText( text );
01444         }
01445 
01452         Attribute* FirstAttribute( bool throwIfNoAttributes = true ) const;
01453 
01460         Attribute* LastAttribute( bool throwIfNoAttributes = true ) const;
01461 
01469         void IterateFirst( const std::string&, Attribute** first ) const
01470         {
01471             *first = 0;
01472             for( Attribute* child = FirstAttribute( false ); child; child = child->Next( false ) )
01473             {
01474                 *first = dynamic_cast< Attribute* >( child );
01475                 if ( 0 != *first )
01476                 {
01477                     return;
01478                 }
01479             }
01480         }
01481 
01489         template < class T >
01490             void SetAttribute ( const std::string& name, const T& value )
01491         {
01492             ValidatePointer();
01493             m_tiXmlPointer->SetAttribute( name, ToString( value ) );
01494         }
01495 
01508         std::string GetText( bool throwIfNotFound = true ) const
01509         {
01510             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01511             std::string temp;
01512             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01513             {
01514                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01515                 {
01516                     TICPPTHROW( "Text does not exists in the current element" );
01517                 }
01518             }
01519 
01520             return temp;
01521         }
01522 
01534         std::string GetTextOrDefault( const std::string& defaultValue ) const
01535         {
01536             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01537             std::string temp;
01538             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01539             {
01540                 return defaultValue;
01541             }
01542 
01543             return temp;
01544         }
01545 
01560         template < class T, class DefaultT >
01561             void GetTextOrDefault( T* value, const DefaultT& defaultValue ) const
01562         {
01563             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01564             std::string temp;
01565             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01566             {
01567                 // The text value does not exist - set value to the default
01568                 *value = defaultValue;
01569                 return;
01570             }
01571 
01572             // Stream the value from the string to T
01573             FromString( temp, value );
01574         }
01575 
01591         template< class T >
01592             void GetText( T* value, bool throwIfNotFound = true ) const
01593         {
01594             // Get the element's text value as a std::string
01595             std::string temp;
01596             if ( !GetTextImp( &temp ) )
01597             {
01598                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01599                 {
01600                     TICPPTHROW( "Text does not exists in the current element" );
01601                 }
01602                 else
01603                 {
01604                     return;
01605                 }
01606             }
01607 
01608             // Stream the value from the string to T
01609             FromString( temp, value );
01610         }
01611 
01619         template < class T >
01620             void SetText( const T& value )
01621         {
01622             ValidatePointer();
01623             std::string temp = ToString( value );
01624 
01625             if ( m_tiXmlPointer->NoChildren() )
01626             {
01627                 m_tiXmlPointer->LinkEndChild( new TiXmlText( temp ) );
01628             }
01629             else
01630             {
01631                 if ( 0 == m_tiXmlPointer->GetText() )
01632                 {
01633                     m_tiXmlPointer->InsertBeforeChild( m_tiXmlPointer->FirstChild(), TiXmlText( temp ) );
01634                 }
01635                 else
01636                 {
01637                     // There already is text, so change it
01638                     m_tiXmlPointer->FirstChild()->SetValue( temp );
01639                 }
01640             }
01641         }
01642 
01654         template < class T, class DefaulT >
01655             void GetAttributeOrDefault( const std::string& name, T* value, const DefaulT& defaultValue ) const
01656         {
01657             // Get the attribute's value as a std::string
01658             std::string temp;
01659             if ( !GetAttributeImp( name, &temp ) )
01660             {
01661                 // The attribute does not exist - set value to the default
01662                 *value = defaultValue;
01663                 return;
01664             }
01665 
01666             // Stream the value from the string to T
01667             FromString( temp, value );
01668         }
01669 
01678         std::string GetAttributeOrDefault( const std::string& name, const std::string& defaultValue ) const;
01679 
01691         template< class T >
01692             void GetAttribute( const std::string& name, T* value, bool throwIfNotFound = true ) const
01693         {
01694             // Get the attribute's value as a std::string
01695             std::string temp;
01696             if ( !GetAttributeImp( name, &temp ) )
01697             {
01698                 if ( throwIfNotFound )
01699                 {
01700                     TICPPTHROW( "Attribute does not exist" );
01701                 }
01702                 else
01703                 {
01704                     return;
01705                 }
01706             }
01707 
01708             // Stream the value from the string to T
01709             FromString( temp, value );
01710         }
01711 
01721         std::string GetAttribute( const std::string& name ) const;
01722 
01723     private:
01724 
01729         bool GetAttributeImp( const std::string& name, std::string* value ) const;
01730 
01735         bool GetTextImp( std::string* value ) const;
01736     };
01737 
01739     class Declaration : public NodeImp< TiXmlDeclaration >
01740     {
01741     public:
01745         Declaration();
01746 
01750         Declaration( TiXmlDeclaration* declaration );
01751 
01755         Declaration( const std::string& version, const std::string& encoding, const std::string& standalone );
01756 
01760         std::string Version() const;
01761 
01765         std::string Encoding() const;
01766 
01770         std::string Standalone() const;
01771     };
